title: Understanding the Context
text: The process involves analyzing large volumes of data to find patterns and insights. It is a key part of data science.

title: Focus on the Term
text: The term often used in data science for discovering patterns and insights is similar to 'mining' for valuable information.

title: Eliminate Incorrect Options
text: Data Cleaning, Data Visualization, and Data Entry are related to data handling but do not specifically refer to discovering patterns.

title: Choose the Correct Term
text: Select the term that best describes the process of discovering patterns and insights from large sets of data.
